titles: An holsome antidotus or counter-poysen, agaynst the pestylent heresye and secte of the Anabaptistes newly translated out of lati[n] into Englysh by Iohn Veron, Senonoys
author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
Véron, John, d. 1563.
publisher: By Humfrey Powell, dwellyng aboue Holburne Conduit,
notes: A translation of a Latin translation of an unidentified work in German by Heinrich Bullinger.
